page.title: 06GAMES AT HOME AND SCHOOL
page.content:
If nobody sets them free the first person who was seen and caught is 'on it'.If nobody has been seen you have to get home which is where the person who is 'on it' stands.
{Slam} To play slam you need a football and four or five players.You kick the football against a wall taking it in turns to do so.You can only kick it once when it is your turn.If you miss the wall you are out and when everybody is out (except one) that person is the winner.
{Sevenses This is an elimination game,where you throw a ball against a wall,seven times.Then you have to perform other bouncing and catching tasks until you are down to one.A dropped ball is out.
